Berlin, Germany

Looking for product managers (with/without experience) and Ruby on Rails developers. Our company is helping to monetize mobile&online games, we get a couple million users per day (growing fast).

We offer a friendly environment with a passion to do things the right way, flexible work hours, requirement to work on-site but not all the time, very international team - only a minority of our employees is German.

Will help will relocation and work permit as necessary, this has become very easy.

More info here: http://www.sponsorpay.com/careers/
